## ## XWiki Dashboard ## ## This dashboard can be used for both wikis (Main.WebHome) ## and spaces (*.WebHome). ## #set($isSpaceDashboard = false) #if($doc.space != "Main") #set($isSpaceDashboard = true) #end 1.1 $msg.get("xe.dashboard.wiki")
## ## Left column. ##
#if(!$isSpaceDashboard) ## ## Wiki spaces and tags ##

$msg.get("xe.dashboard.wiki.spaces")

#includeInContext("Main.Spaces")

$msg.get("xe.dashboard.wiki.tagcloud")

#includeInContext("XWiki.TagCloud") #else ## ## Space documents and tags ##

$msg.get("xe.dashboard.space.documents", [$doc.space])

#set($docNames = $xwiki.getSpaceDocsName($doc.space)) #displayDocumentList($docNames false $blacklistedSpaces)

$msg.get("xe.dashboard.wiki.tagcloud")

#set($tagCloudSpace = $doc.space) #includeInContext("XWiki.TagCloud") #end
## ## Right column ##
## ## Recent changes ## #if(!$isSpaceDashboard)

$msg.get("xe.dashboard.wiki.recentchanges")

#else

$msg.get("xe.dashboard.space.recentchanges", [$doc.space])

## Set variables to limit recent changes to the current space and 15 items. #set($rcSpace = [$doc.space]) #set($rcChangesNb = 15) #end #includeInContext("Main.RecentChanges")
